Posts.Content: Sep 2, 2009 04:06PM karmi2az wrote: Hello, I had a mx 15 years ago and they removed 6 nodes at the time of surgery.  Sentinel node biopsy did not exist then.  I now have cancer in the other breast and will be going for another mx with reconstruction this time.  Fifteen years ago my biggest obstacle, post surgery, was my armpit and down the back of my arm.  Both were extremely sensitive to even light touch with shooting pains.  It was the last discomfort to leave.  I still do have some numbness in the two areas but not pain.  My situation is a little different but that is what I found.   Best wishes.
Posts.Title: Underarm Pain - SNB Mantra shelleyr25
